## blockRendering.IPathObject interface

An interface for a block's path object.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IPathObject 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [constants](./blockly.blockrendering.ipathobject.constants.md) |  | [ConstantProvider](./blockly.blockrendering.constantprovider.md) | The renderer's constant provider. |
|  [style](./blockly.blockrendering.ipathobject.style.md) |  | BlockStyle | The primary path of the block. |
|  [svgPath](./blockly.blockrendering.ipathobject.svgpath.md) |  | SVGElement | The primary path of the block. |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [addConnectionHighlight(connection, connectionPath, offset, rtl)?](./blockly.blockrendering.ipathobject.addconnectionhighlight.md) | _(Optional)_ Adds the given path as a connection highlight for the given connection. |
|  [applyColour(block)?](./blockly.blockrendering.ipathobject.applycolour.md) | _(Optional)_ Apply the stored colours to the block's path, taking into account whether the paths belong to a shadow block. |
|  [flipRTL()](./blockly.blockrendering.ipathobject.fliprtl.md) | Flip the SVG paths in RTL. |
|  [removeConnectionHighlight(connection)?](./blockly.blockrendering.ipathobject.removeconnectionhighlight.md) | _(Optional)_ Removes any highlight associated with the given connection, if it exists. |
|  [setPath(pathString)](./blockly.blockrendering.ipathobject.setpath.md) | Set the path generated by the renderer onto the respective SVG element. |
|  [setStyle(blockStyle)?](./blockly.blockrendering.ipathobject.setstyle.md) | _(Optional)_ Update the style. |
|  [updateDraggingDelete(enabled)](./blockly.blockrendering.ipathobject.updatedraggingdelete.md) | Add or remove styling showing that a block is dragged over a delete area. |
|  [updateHighlighted(highlighted)](./blockly.blockrendering.ipathobject.updatehighlighted.md) | Set whether the block shows a highlight or not. Block highlighting is often used to visually mark blocks currently being executed. |
|  [updateInsertionMarker(enabled)](./blockly.blockrendering.ipathobject.updateinsertionmarker.md) | Add or remove styling showing that a block is an insertion marker. |
|  [updateMovable(enabled)](./blockly.blockrendering.ipathobject.updatemovable.md) | Add or remove styling showing that a block is movable. |
|  [updateSelected(enabled)](./blockly.blockrendering.ipathobject.updateselected.md) | Add or remove styling showing that a block is selected. |
